ProductInfo.Features:
7'' Dual Core 2H-2 Google Android 4.2 Tablet PC, Dual Camera, HD 800x480, Google Play Pre-load, 3D Game Supported (enhanced version of A13) [By TabletExpress] (2.Pink)
Operating System: Google Android 4.2(Jelly Bean)
Menu Languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Italian,
The DT 2H-2 featuring the newest powerful and robust Dual Core CPU with DDR3 ram, makes everything run faster than ever. Plus, high-performance Dual Core Mali-400 GPU ensures smooth and dynamic 3D graphics.
Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) keeps you connected on the go. Front-facing camera makes it easy to chat with friends and family, while rear-facing camera allows you to capture the special moments and upload them to facebook and twitter.
